favourite.article: Hallelujah! Lord Jesus I love You!

I enjoyed seeing that our Christian life is a life and goes from level to level, from strength to strength, little by little. Don't be discouraged for where you are in life! It is not an instant transformation - we will not become overcomers overnight. We have seen something of the Lord, and we will get there! The Lord will gain His House, His Dwelling Place! It is our destiny to go on enjoying Christ by living ordinary days in His divine dispensing, from glory to glory!

I grew to love the chorus of this hymn more and more each day - we are SO blessed to be able to live the normal church life in the divine dispensing. It is our destiny in Christ to be satisfied with ordinary days, and I wouldn't have it any other way :) The Lord's not looking for spiritual giants in the church life but simply normal functioning Christians that faithfully love Him, little by little, morning by morning, from strength to strength, grace upon grace! Hallelujah!

Praise the Lord it's not an instant transformation. Every day, little by little - that's how we grow in Him. By beholding and reflecting, we are being transformed into the same image from glory to glory!

article.author: Renan Lapinig Ansing
article.city: The Church in Larena, Siquijor, Philippines

favourite.article: The Divine Dispensing of Christ is flowing freely, every moment of everyday.
It is a blessing to be satisfied with ordinary days in the divine dispensing!
It is our destiny to live a normal life in the divine dispensing.
It is our destiny! To live a normal life in the divine dispensing! :)
The greatest blessing is to live a life under and in the divine dispensing! And it is our destiny!!!! Hallelujah!!!

Praise the Lord! It is so normal, so ordinary to us to spend our days living under the divine dispensing of our God. Truly, we are being supplied by Himself as the rich grace, enabling us to go on in our Christian life. Thus, our Christian life must be day by day, little by little, grace upon grace, and from glory to glory. It is so normal to us to live in the Divine life under His Divine dispensing.
Praise the Lord! We, Christians should dare to be different in the world yet normal in Christ through His dispensing.
Love the trainees and love this song, bless you guys. :-) #ordinarydays
Praise the Lord! It is very normal to be satisfied with ordinary days. O Lord Jesus! I want to be a normal Christian. May this satisfaction be prevailing in the divine dispensing. :)
We thank the Lord for this miraculous normality. It is such a blessing to be satisfied with ordinary days in the divine dispensing.
